title: Add client editing, client name, client password authentication, and network monitoring status toggle

requirements.text: Add client name field (Nome) to the backend ClientRecord data structure and update all CRUD operations to handle this field
acceptanceCriteria: Backend ClientRecord includes Nome field as Text type
Create operation accepts and stores Nome
Get operations return Nome
Update operation can modify Nome

requirements.text: Add client password field (Senha_Cliente) to the backend ClientRecord data structure for client authentication and update all CRUD operations to handle this field

quotes: cadastrar uma senha para o cliente para mais segurança

acceptanceCriteria: Backend ClientRecord includes Senha_Cliente field as Text type
Create operation accepts and stores Senha_Cliente
Get operations return Senha_Cliente
Update operation can modify Senha_Cliente

requirements.text: Create backend update function that allows modifying all client fields (Nome, IP_VPS, User_VPS, Senha_VPS, Plano, Senha_Cliente) for an existing client by ID_Luid

quotes: editar as informações do cliente no caso as credenciais da vps ip e senha e plano etc

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes update function accepting ID_Luid and new field values
Function validates that client exists before updating
All client fields can be updated independently
Returns success/failure result

requirements.text: Add network monitoring status field to backend with possible values 'normal' and 'offline', including functions to set and get this status

quotes: gerenciar o monitoramento de rede tipo colocar a opção de alternar para normal e offline

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores network monitoring status as Text ("normal" or "offline")
Backend exposes function to set monitoring status
Backend exposes function to get current monitoring status
Default status is "normal"

requirements.text: Update ClientRegistrationForm component in admin panel to include Nome (client name) input field and save it when creating new clients
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes Nome text input field
Nome field is required for submission
Nome value is sent to backend during client creation
Form validation handles empty Nome field

requirements.text: Update ClientRegistrationForm component in admin panel to include Senha_Cliente (client password) input field and save it when creating new clients

quotes: cadastrar uma senha para o cliente para mais segurança

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes Senha_Cliente password input field
Senha_Cliente field is required for submission
Password input type is used for security
Senha_Cliente value is sent to backend during client creation

requirements.text: Create client edit form/modal in admin panel that allows editing all client fields (Nome, IP_VPS, User_VPS, Senha_VPS, Plano, Senha_Cliente) for existing clients

quotes: editar as informações do cliente no caso as credenciais da vps ip e senha e plano etc

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel shows edit button for each client in ClientList
Clicking edit opens form/modal pre-filled with current client data
All fields (Nome, IP_VPS, User_VPS, Senha_VPS, Plano, Senha_Cliente) are editable
Save button triggers backend update mutation
Success/error toast notifications display after update
Client list refreshes after successful update

requirements.text: Update ClientList component to display Nome (client name) column in the admin panel table
acceptanceCriteria: Table includes Nome column
Nome value displays for each client row
Column is positioned appropriately in table layout

requirements.text: Update client login flow to require both ID_Luid and Senha_Cliente (password) for authentication instead of ID only

quotes: cadastrar uma senha para o cliente para mais segurança

acceptanceCriteria: ClientLogin page includes password input field in addition to ID_Luid
Login validation checks both ID_Luid and Senha_Cliente against backend data
Login fails if password does not match
Error message displays for invalid credentials
Successful login proceeds to client dashboard

requirements.text: Add network monitoring status toggle control in admin panel with options 'Normal' and 'Offline' that updates backend status

quotes: do painel de administração deixe também gerenciar o monitoramento de rede tipo colocar a opção de alternar para normal e offline

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel displays toggle control with 'Normal' and 'Offline' options
Current monitoring status is fetched from backend and displayed
Changing toggle updates backend monitoring status
Visual feedback confirms status change
Toggle state persists across page refreshes

requirements.text: Modify network speed simulation logic to display zero Gbps when monitoring status is 'Offline' and normal oscillating speeds when status is 'Normal'

quotes: quando estiver em offline a velocidade do monitoramento fica em zero

acceptanceCriteria: useNetworkSpeedSimulation hook fetches current monitoring status from backend
When status is 'Offline', network speed returns 0 Gbps
When status is 'Normal', network speed oscillates between 2.5-4.8 Gbps as before
NetworkSpeedChart component correctly displays zero speed when offline
Chart updates in real-time when monitoring status changes

requirements.text: Add frontend mutation hooks for updating client records and managing network monitoring status
acceptanceCriteria: useQueries.ts includes updateClient mutation hook
useQueries.ts includes setMonitoringStatus mutation hook
useQueries.ts includes getMonitoringStatus query hook
Mutations invalidate relevant query caches on success
Hooks integrate with TanStack Query properly

requirements.text: Generate migration.mo to preserve existing client data when adding Nome and Senha_Cliente fields to ClientRecord structure
acceptanceCriteria: migration.mo includes transformation logic for new ClientRecord structure
Existing clients receive default empty string values for Nome and Senha_Cliente
No existing client data is lost during migration
Migration handles null/missing values gracefully

constraints: Do not modify Internet Identity authentication hooks (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts)
Do not modify read-only UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve Dark Premium theme with Carbon Black background and Neon Green (#39FF14) accents
Keep existing admin authentication credentials unchanged (ID: SidneiCosta00, Password: Nikebolado@4)
nonGoals: Implementing password hashing or encryption for client passwords
Creating role-based access control beyond admin/client distinction
Adding email notifications for client credential changes
Creating audit logs for client edits
